name: Cyrus Prism Star
effect:
You can play this card only if your Active Pokémon is a {W} or {M} Pokémon.
Your opponent chooses 2 Benched Pokémon and shuffles the others, and all cards attached to them, into their deck.
author: Masakazu Fukuda
rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
